name: Bean Simulator EARLY ACCESS
description:
Click the can of beans and maybe characters will appear that give you more beans.

I was inspired when a bean went over and ate my finger, screamed "CHECKMATE", and sang the Star Spangled Banner while trying to find a hotel on Google Maps

Features:

COMPLETELY FREE (for now)

NO NEED FOR DOWNLOADING

EVERYTHING SUCKS AND WILL PROBABLY GLITCH OUT

10 CHARACTERS

LIKE 4 MINUTES OF GAMEPLAY

ACHIEVEMENTS!
